name: Skyward Spiral
description: A thrilling ride that shoot you up into the sky at tremendous speeds and spins you around as you descend back to the ground.

name: Starlight Soar
description: Our scariest ride yet, take a leap on our rollercoaster that only operates after dark.

name: Eclipse Coaster
description: A rollercoaster that takes you through our accurate planetarium for a fun but educational ride.

name: Sarcophagus Trap Adventure
description: Travel back to Ancient Egypt in this amazing adventure to learn everything from how they lived to what happened after they died.
status: Closed due to School Trip - reopens to the public at 3pm

name: Inferno Rapids
description: Get thrown around on a donut in a crazy torrent of water.

name: Relaxing River
description: Relax on a donut as you travel down a calm stream of water.

name: Phantom Caverns
description: Take a ride through haunted caverns, shoot the ghosts and get scared by real actors.

name: Clown House
description: Walk through a twisted version of a fun house with real actors waiting around every corner to scare you.
